items.name: static var patternSolid: CTUnderlineStyleModifiers
items.desc: A modifier that indicates to draw a solid underline.

items.name: static var patternDot: CTUnderlineStyleModifiers
items.desc: A modifier that indicates to draw an underline using a pattern of dots.

items.name: static var patternDash: CTUnderlineStyleModifiers
items.desc: A modifier that indicates to draw an underline using a pattern of dashes.

items.name: static var patternDashDot: CTUnderlineStyleModifiers
items.desc: A modifier that indicates to draw an underline using a pattern of alternating dashes and dots.

items.name: static var patternDashDotDot: CTUnderlineStyleModifiers
items.desc: A modifier that indicates to draw an underline using a pattern of a dash followed by two dots.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int32)
items.desc: Creates an underline style modifiers structure with the specified raw value.
